column5: Well its been so windy that we haven't been able to get out on the river. Went out friday morning and caught about 24. Anything from walleye to perch to a nice little smallie. today the winds were lighter so off we went. i know its me holding them,but she's catching them.        These sheepshead really put up a fight, but she got this one all by herself. im gonna get her to hold one next time. just have to convince her that they aren't yucky !!!!!
they always out fish us  why is that....LOL
Wow, your Wife sure is ugly!
Please tell her I said well done!
She probably had a slower retrieve!!
you know .......she said the same thing last nite i'm always retrieving too fast.......
The key is to let them out fish you just enough,
